entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 6:50 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
